machine_extruder_start_code.default_value:
;---- Starting Start G-code Extruder 2 ----
;T1 ;switch to extruder 2
;G92 E0;reset extruder distance
;---- Ending Start G-code Extruder 2 ----

machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
;---- Starting End G-code Extruder 2 ----
;G92 E0
;---- Ending End G-code Extruder 2 ----
